<A NAME="eolPage78"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX" ALIGN="CENTER">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	WILLIAMS-SONOMA, INC. 401(k) PLAN
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX" ALIGN="CENTER">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	PREAMBLE
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; TEXT-INDENT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	The Williams-Sonoma, Inc. 401(k) Plan (&#147;Plan&#148;) permits eligible associates to defer receipt of their compensation on a pre-tax
	basis in order to promote retirement savings. The Plan also provides for matching contributions to be made on the basis of the pre-tax contributions. The Plan provides for distributions in the event of termination of employment. In addition,
	in-service withdrawals are permitted at age 59-1/2 or on account of hardship, and loans are available to eligible associates who are not on leaves of absence.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; TEXT-INDENT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	The Plan consists of: (1)&nbsp;a profit-sharing plan containing a cash or deferred arrangement and a matching contribution arrangement that are intended to meet the requirements for qualification and
	tax-exemption under Code &#167; &#167; 401(a), 401(k) and 401(m) and (2)&nbsp;an employee stock ownership plan (the &#147;ESOP&#148;) that is intended to qualify as a stock bonus plan under Code &#167; 401(a) and to meet the requirements for
	employee stock ownership plans under Code &#167; 4975(e)(7) and ERISA &#167; 407(d)(6). The ESOP portion of the Plan is that portion of the Plan which, as of any applicable date, is invested in the Williams-Sonoma, Inc. Stock Fund. The profit
	sharing and ESOP portions of the Plan constitute a single plan under Treasury Regulation &#167; 1.414(l)-1(b)(1).
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; TEXT-INDENT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	The Plan
	was originally established February&nbsp;1, 1989 as the Williams-Sonoma, Inc. Employee Profit Sharing and Stock Incentive Plan. It was later renamed the Williams-Sonoma, Inc. Associate Stock Incentive Plan and effective April&nbsp;21, 2006, the
	Williams-Sonoma, Inc. 401(k) Plan.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX" ALIGN="CENTER">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	-1-
</FONT>
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage79"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX" ALIGN="CENTER">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	ARTICLE I&#151;DEFINITIONS
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	Where the following, boldfaced words and phrases appear in this Plan with initial capitals, they shall have the meaning set forth below.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	1.1
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	&#147;Account&#148;
</B>
	means the sum of a Participant&#146;s Matching Contributions Account, Pre-tax Contributions Account, Age 50 Catch-up Contributions Account,
	Rollover Contributions Account and Profit Sharing Contributions Account, which sum constitutes the Participant&#146;s total interest in the Trust.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	1.2
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	&#147;Age 50 Catch-up Contributions&#148;
</B>
	means Pre-tax Contributions made pursuant to Section 3.2(d).
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	1.3
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	&#147;Age 50 Catch-up Contributions Account&#148;
</B>
	means the separate subaccount of a Participant&#146;s Account to which Age 50 Catch-up Contributions and any
	income or loss thereon are credited.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	1.4
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	&#147;Associate&#148;
</B>
	means any person who is receiving compensation as a common law employee for personal services rendered in the employment of the Employer.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	(a)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	No self-employed individual shall be an Associate under this Plan by virtue of his or her self-employment (except as provided in (c)&nbsp;below). An individual shall
	not be considered to be in &#147;employment&#148; unless the individual is classified by the Employer as being in employment.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	(b)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	If a former Associate&#146;s termination of employment did not constitute a Separation from Service, such individual shall be treated as a current Associate for
	purposes of the withdrawal provisions of Article VI and the loan provisions of Article VII.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	(c)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	The term &#147;Associate&#148; shall also include an individual who performs services for the Employer (other than an associate of the Employer), who pursuant to an
	agreement between the Employer and any other person (&#147;leasing organization&#148;) has performed services for the Employer (and related persons determined in accordance with Code &#167; 414(n)(6)) determined on a substantially full-time basis
	for a period of at least one year, and such services are performed under the primary direction or control by the Employer. Notwithstanding the foregoing, if such leased employees constitute less than 20% of the Employer&#146;s Non-highly Compensated
	Employees within the meaning of Code &#167; 414(n)(1)(C)(ii), the term &#147;Associate&#148; shall not include those leased employees covered by a plan described in Code &#167; Section&nbsp;414(n)(5).
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX" ALIGN="CENTER">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	-2-
</FONT>
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage80"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	1.5
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	&#147;Beneficiary&#148;
</B>
	means the person designated by a Participant pursuant to the specific procedures established by the Plan Administrator for this purpose,
	or such other person who becomes entitled to a benefit under the Plan, in accordance with Section 8.9.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	1.6
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	&#147;Beneficiary Designation Form&#148;
</B>
	means a form prescribed by the Plan Administrator for designating Beneficiaries.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	1.7
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	&#147;Board of Directors or Board&#148;
</B>
	means the Board of Directors of the Company.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	1.8
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	&#147;Borrower&#148;
</B>
	means a Participant who has made an application for or who has received a loan from the Plan in accordance with Section 7.1.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	1.9
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	&#147;Casual Associate&#148;
</B>
	means an Associate who is classified as a casual associate by the Associate&#146;s Employer and who is not in an ineligible
	classification under Section 2.1(b).
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	1.10
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	&#147;Code&#148;
</B>
	means the Internal Revenue Code of 1986, as amended.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	1.11
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	&#147;Company&#148;
</B>
	means Williams-Sonoma, Inc., a corporation organized and existing under the laws of the State of California, or its successor or successors.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	1.12
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	&#147;Company Stock&#148;
</B>
	means shares of common stock of Williams-Sonoma, Inc.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	1.13
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	&#147;Company&#146;s Controlled Group&#148;
</B>
	means the controlled group of organizations of which the Company is a part, as defined by Code &#167; 414 and
	regulations issued thereunder. An entity shall be considered a member of the Company&#146;s Controlled Group only during the period it is one of the group of organizations described in the preceding sentence.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	1.14
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	&#147;Compensation&#148; means:
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	(a)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	For purposes of the Actual Deferral Percentage test and the Actual Contribution Percentage test in Article XIV, any definition of compensation permissible under Code
	&#167; 414(s), as chosen by the Plan Administrator for each Plan Year.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	(b)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	For all other purposes, including Section&nbsp;1.30 and Articles XV and XVI, an Associate&#146;s W-2 wages as reported or reportable (determined without regard to any
	rules that limit the remuneration included in wages based on the nature or location of the employment or the services performed such as the exception for agricultural labor in Code &#167; 3401(a)(2)) as described in Treasury Regulation &#167;
	1.415(c)-2(d)(3). Such Compensation shall also include contributions that are made by an Employer that are not includible in gross income under Code &#167;&#167; 125 (cafeteria plan salary reduction amounts), 402(g)(3) (pre-tax deferrals) and
	132(f)(4) (qualified transportation benefits).
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="8%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	(i)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	Except as described in paragraph (ii), Compensation for the Plan Year must be actually paid or made available to the Associate (or, if earlier,
	includible in the gross income of the Associate) within the Plan Year and it must be paid or treated as paid prior to his severance from employment within the meaning of Treasury Regulation &#167; 1.415(a)-1(1)(5).
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX" ALIGN="CENTER">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	-3-
</FONT>
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage81"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="13%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	Notwithstanding the foregoing, Compensation for a Plan Year shall include amounts earned but not paid during the Plan Year solely because of the timing of payroll periods and pay dates if the
	following requirements are satisfied:
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="13%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	(A)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	these amounts are paid during the first few weeks of the next Plan Year;
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="13%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	(B)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	the amounts are included on a uniform and consistent basis with respect to all similarly situated Associates, and
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="13%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	(C)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	no such Compensation is included in more than one Plan Year.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="8%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	(ii)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	(A) Notwithstanding paragraph (i), any amount described in subparagraph (B)&nbsp;or (C)&nbsp;does not fail to be Compensation for an Associate merely because it is paid
	after his severance from employment provided that it is paid by the later of 2-1/2 months after his severance from employment or the end of the Plan Year that includes the date of his severance from employment.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="13%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	(B)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	An amount is described in this subparagraph if
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="17%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	(I)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	it is regular compensation for services during the Associate&#146;s regular working hours or compensation for services outside the Associate&#146;s regular working
	hours (such as overtime or shift differential, commissions, bonuses or other similar payments), and
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="17%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	(II)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	the payment would have been paid to the Associate prior to his severance from employment if he had continued employment with the Company or any member of the
	Company&#146;s Controlled Group.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="13%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	(C)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	An amount is described in this subparagraph if it is
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="17%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	(I)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	payment for unused accrued bona fide sick, vacation or other leave, but only if the Associate would have been able to use the leave if his employment had continued, or
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="17%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	(II)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	received by the Associate pursuant to a nonqualified unfunded deferred compensation plan, but only if the payment would have been paid to the Associate at the same time
	if the Associate had continued in employment with the Company or a member of the Company&#146;s Controlled Group and only to the extent it is includible in the Associate&#146;s gross income;
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX" ALIGN="CENTER">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	-4-
</FONT>
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage82"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	provided, however, that such amounts would have been included in the definition of Compensation if they were
	paid prior to the Associate&#146;s severance from employment with the Company or any member of the Company&#146;s Controlled Group.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="8%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	(iii)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	Compensation shall include payments to:
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="13%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	(A)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	an individual who does not currently perform services for the Company or a member of the Company&#146;s Controlled Group by reason of qualified military service (as
	defined in Code &#167; 414(u)(1)) to the extent those payments do not exceed the amounts the individual would have received if he had continued to perform services for the Company or any member of the Company&#146;s Controlled Group rather than
	entering into qualified military service; or
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="13%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	(B)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	an Associate who is permanently and totally disabled within the meaning of Code &#167; 22(e)(3) if the conditions described in Treasury Regulation &#167;
	415(c)-2(g)(4)(ii) are satisfied.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="8%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	(iv)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	Compensation shall not include the following post-severance payments:
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="13%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	(A)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	severance payments or parachute payments within the meaning of Code &#167; 280G(b)(2) if they are paid after severance from employment; and
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="13%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	(B)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	post-severance payments from a nonqualified unfunded deferred compensation plan unless the payments would have been paid at that time without regard to the
	Associate&#146;s severance from employment.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	(c)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	Notwithstanding the above, a Participant&#146;s Compensation for a Plan Year shall not exceed, for 2015, $265,000 (or such higher dollar amount as may permissibly apply
	for the Plan Year pursuant to adjustments in the dollar limitation under Code &#167; 401(a)(17) announced by the Secretary of the Treasury).
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; MARGIN-LEFT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	In the case of a Plan Year of less than 12 months, the limitation specified in the previous sentence shall be adjusted by first dividing the limit by 12 and then multiplying the resulting quotient by the
	number of months in the Plan Year.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	1.15
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	&#147;Contribution Election&#148;
</B>
	means the election made by an Eligible Associate or Participant selecting the percentage of Eligible Pay to be deferred and
	contributed to the Plan by the Employer as a Pre-tax Contribution.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	1.16
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	&#147;Disability&#148;
</B>
	means the total and permanent incapacity of a Participant to perform the usual duties of employment for an Employer due
	to physical impairment or legally established mental incompetence. &#147;Disability&#148; shall be determined on evidence that the Participant has become entitled to receive primary benefits as a disabled employee under the Social Security Act in
	effect on the date of disability. If Participant&#146;s incapacity is
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX" ALIGN="CENTER">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	-5-
</FONT>
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage83"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	due to alcohol, drugs, or other substance abuse, the Participant must be enrolled or have completed a rehabilitation program approved by the Company for such disability to constitute a
	&#147;Disability.&#148;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	1.17
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	&#147;Effective Date&#148;
</B>
	means January&nbsp;1, 2016, the date that this restatement of the Plan is first effective. Certain identified provisions are effective
	on different dates, as noted herein. The Plan itself was first effective February&nbsp;1, 1989.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	1.18
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	&#147;Eligible Associate&#148;
</B>
	means an Associate who has met the eligibility and entry date requirements to be a Participant under Article II, without regard to
	whether the Associate has elected to make Pre-tax Contributions. For purposes of the nondiscrimination tests in Article XIV, an Associate with no Compensation for a Plan Year shall not be treated as an Eligible Associate for that Plan Year.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	1.19
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	&#147;Eligibility Computation Periods&#148;
</B>
	mean: (i)&nbsp;the twelve-consecutive-month period that begins on the Associate&#146;s Start Date, (ii)&nbsp;the
	first Plan Year that begins on or after such Associate&#146;s Start Date, and (iii)&nbsp;each succeeding Plan Year.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	1.20
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	&#147;Eligible Pay&#148;
</B>
	means the amount of regular, recurring compensation of an Associate, including base salary and hourly wages plus overtime pay and
	differential wage payments described in Code &#167;&#167; 414(u)(12)(A) and (D). &#147;Eligible Pay&#148; is determined prior to reduction for any Pre-tax Contributions made on behalf of the Participant and for any amount allocated to a cafeteria
	plan maintained pursuant to Code &#167; 125. &#147;Eligible Pay&#148; does not include any other items of compensation, such as: (a)&nbsp;commissions, (b)&nbsp;bonuses paid at the discretion of the Company, (c)&nbsp;the value of stock options
	granted to or exercised by an Associate or former Associate during the Plan Year, (d)&nbsp;car allowances, (e)&nbsp;expense reimbursements, (f)&nbsp;nonqualified deferred compensation deferred by or paid to an Associate or former Associate, or
	(g)&nbsp;amounts described in Sections 1.14(b)(i)&#151;(iv)&nbsp;(except to the extent such amounts are differential wage payments described above). Eligible pay is further limited by the same dollar limitations that are set forth in subsection
	(b)&nbsp;of the definition of &#147;Compensation&#148; in this Article I. Eligible Pay does not include earnings during periods in which the Associate is not an Eligible Associate.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>

	-6-

<A NAME="eolPage84"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	(g)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	a Roth IRA (described in Code &#167; 408A) (subject to the applicable rules for such rollovers). Under no circumstances is the Plan Administrator responsible for
	assuring that the distributee is eligible to make a direct rollover to a Roth IRA.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; MARGIN-LEFT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	The definition of an
	&#147;Eligible Retirement Plan&#148; shall apply in the case of a Eligible Rollover Distribution to a Participant, his Spouse or former spouse who is the alternate payee under a qualified domestic relations order, as defined in Code &#167; 414(p).
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; MARGIN-LEFT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	However, in the case of an Eligible Rollover Distribution to a Beneficiary who is not the Participant&#146;s Spouse or former
	spouse under a qualified domestic relations order, Eligible Retirement Plan shall mean only an individual retirement account described in Code &#167; 408(a) or an individual retirement annuity described in Code &#167; 408(b). A direct rollover to a
	Beneficiary who is not the Participant&#146;s Spouse or former spouse under a qualified domestic relations order must be accomplished through a direct trustee-to-trustee transfer to an Eligible Retirement Plan described in the preceding sentence.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>

</B>
	means:

	(a)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	Any distribution under the Plan of all or any portion of a Participant&#146;s Account, other than:

	A distribution that is one of a series of substantially equal periodic payments (made not less frequently than annually) made for the life (or life expectancy) of the
	Participant (or the Participant&#146;s Surviving Spouse) or the joint lives (or joint life expectancies) of the Participant (or the Participant&#146;s Surviving Spouse) and the Participant&#146;s (or the Participant&#146;s Surviving Spouse&#146;s)
	designated beneficiary;
</FONT>
</TD>

	(ii)
</FONT>
</TD>

	&nbsp;

<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;

	&nbsp;

	(v)
</FONT>

<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	The portion of any distribution in excess of the amount that would be includible in gross income were it not rolled over to an Eligible Retirement Plan (disregarding
	for this purpose, the exclusion from income applicable to net unrealized appreciation when employer securities are distributed).
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	(b)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	Notwithstanding subsection (a)(v), an Eligible Rollover Distribution may include after-tax contributions only to the extent such distribution is
	transferred to an Eligible Retirement Plan described in Section&nbsp;1.21(a), (b), (d)&nbsp;or (e). Any such transfer of after-tax contributions to an Eligible Retirement Plan described in
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX" ALIGN="CENTER">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	-7-
</FONT>
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage85"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="8%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	Section&nbsp;1.21(d) or (e)&nbsp;must be accomplished through a direct trustee-to-trustee transfer which provides for separate accounting for amounts so transferred (including separately
	accounting for the portion of such distribution which is includable in gross income and the portion of the such distribution which is not so includable). However, as described in Section&nbsp;1.53, after-tax contributions are not accepted as
	Rollover Contributions to the Plan.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	1.23
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	&#147;Employer&#148;
</B>
	means the Company and any subsidiary which is authorized by the Company to participate herein.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">

	1.24
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	&#147;Employment Commencement Date&#148;
</B>
	means the date on which the Associate first performs an Hour of Service for which the Associate is paid or entitled to
	payment for the performance of duties for the Employer or any other employer within the Company&#146;s Controlled Group.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">

	behalf of IRS Highly Compensated Employees in excess of the Actual Deferral Percentage test limits set forth in Section 14.2.
</FONT>
</TD>

	of the annual limitation on Pre-tax Contributions set forth in Section 3.2(b).
</FONT>

	Agreement;
</FONT>

	provided
</U>
	that a party shall be a Fiduciary only with respect to its specific responsibilities
	in connection with the Plan and Trust.

	an ineligible classification under Section 2.1(b).
</FONT>

</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	&#147;IRS Highly Compensated Employee&#148;
</B>
	means any Associate of the Company&#146;s Controlled Group (whether or not eligible for participation in the Plan)
	who, for the applicable Plan Year:
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	(a)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	Was a five-percent owner (as defined in Code &#167; 416(i)) for the applicable Plan Year or the immediately preceding Plan Year, or
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	(b)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	Received Compensation in excess of $120,000 or such other amount as may apply for the preceding Plan Year pursuant to adjustments in the compensation amount under Code
	&#167; 414(q)(1)(B) announced by the Secretary of Treasury.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; MARGIN-LEFT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	Associates who are nonresident aliens and who
	receive no earned income from any employer within the Company&#146;s Controlled Group which constitutes income from sources within the United States shall be disregarded for all purposes of this Section.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	1.31
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	&#147;Hour of Service&#148;
</B>
	means, with respect to any applicable computation period,
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	(a)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<U>
	Performance of Duties
</U>
	. Each hour for which the Associate is paid or entitled to payment for the performance of duties for the Employer or any other employer
	within the Company&#146;s Controlled Group;
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	(b)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<U>
	Paid Leave
</U>
	. Each hour for which the Associate is paid or entitled to payment by the Employer or any other employer within the Company&#146;s Controlled Group on
	account of a period during which no duties are performed, whether or not the employment relationship has terminated, due to vacation, holiday, illness, incapacity (including disability), layoff, jury duty, military duty or leave of absence, but not
	more than 501 hours for any single continuous period, provided that no hours shall be credited on account of any period during which the Associate performs no duties and receives payment solely for the purpose of complying with unemployment
	compensation, workers&#146; compensation or disability insurance laws;
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	(c)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<U>
	Back Pay
</U>
	. Each hour for which back pay, irrespective of mitigation of damages, is either awarded or agreed to by the Employer or any other employer within the
	Company&#146;s Controlled Group, excluding any hours credited under subsection (a)&nbsp;or (b), which shall be credited to the computation period or periods to which the award, agreement or payment pertains rather than to the computation period in
	which the award, agreement or payment is made;
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	(d)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<U>
	Parental Leave
</U>
	. Solely for purposes of determining whether an Associate has incurred a break in service, each hour for which an Associate would
	normally be credited under subsection (a)&nbsp;or (b)&nbsp;above during a period of parental leave but not more than 501 hours for any single continuous period. However, the number
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX" ALIGN="CENTER">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	-9-
</FONT>
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage87"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="8%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	of hours credited to an Associate under this subsection (d)&nbsp;during the computation period in which the parental leave began, when added to the hours credited to an Associate under
	subsections (a)&nbsp;through (c)&nbsp;above during that computation period, shall not exceed 501. If the number of hours credited under this subsection (d)&nbsp;for the computation period in which the parental leave began is zero, the provisions of
	this subsection (d)&nbsp;shall apply as though the parental leave began in the immediately following computation period. For this purpose, a parental leave means a period in which the Associate is absent from work immediately following his or her
	active employment because of the Associate&#146;s pregnancy, the birth of the Associate&#146;s child or the placement of a child with the Associate in connection with the adoption of that child by the Associate, or for purposes of caring for that
	child for a period beginning immediately following such birth or placement; and
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	(e)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<U>
	Family and Medical Leave Act
</U>
	. Solely for purposes of determining whether an Associate has incurred a break in service, each hour for which an Associate would
	normally be credited under subsection (a)&nbsp;or (b)&nbsp;above, and not otherwise credited under subsection (d)&nbsp;above, during a period of unpaid leave for the birth, adoption or placement of a child, to care for a spouse or an immediate
	family member with a serious illness or for the Associate&#146;s own illness pursuant to the Family and Medical Leave Act of 1993 and the regulations thereunder.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; MARGIN-LEFT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	Hours of Service to be credited to an individual under subsections (b), (c), (d)&nbsp;and (e)&nbsp;above will be calculated by the Plan Administrator by reference to the individual&#146;s most recent work
	schedule. The Hours of Service credited shall be determined as required by Department of Labor regulations &#167;&#167; 2530.200b-2(b) and (c), and the rules set forth in such Sections are hereby incorporated by reference.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX" ALIGN="CENTER">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	-10-
</FONT>
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage88"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	1.32
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	&#147;Investment Election&#148;
</B>
	means the election by which a Participant directs the investment of his or her Account in accordance with Section 4.2.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	1.33
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	&#147;Investment Fund&#148;
</B>
	means any of the funds described in Article IV into which a Participant&#146;s Account may be invested.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	1.34
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	&#147;Leave of Absence&#148;
</B>
	shall mean any absence authorized by an Employer under the Employer&#146;s standard personnel practices, whether paid or unpaid, to
	the extent the leave does not exceed one year (unless otherwise required by applicable law). A Leave of Absence shall include an absence from work because of reasons covered by, and only while the absence is protected by, the Family and Medical
	Leave Act of 1993 and its regulations (&#147;FMLA&#148;). For the avoidance of doubt, if your absence from work is not protected by FMLA or any other federal or state law, you will not be considered to be on a Leave of Absence for any periods after
	the one-year anniversary of your absence from work.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	1.35
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	&#147;Matching Contributions&#148;
</B>
	means the contributions made by the Employer to a Participant&#146;s Matching Contributions Account pursuant to Section 3.3.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	1.36
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	&#147;Matching Contributions Account&#148;
</B>
	means the separate subaccount of a Participant&#146;s Account which reflects the amount attributable to a
	Participant&#146;s Matching Contributions and earnings and losses thereon.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>

</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">

	&#147;Non-highly Compensated Employee&#148;
</B>
	means an Associate who is not a IRS Highly Compensated Employee.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>

	classification under Section 2.1(b).
</FONT>

</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">

</B>

	participation, as determined under Section 2.1.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>

	1.41
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	&#147;Participant Response System&#148;
</B>
	means the Participant Response System established by the Company or a third party vendor to permit
	Participants to manage their Account and communicate with the Plan Administrator, Trustee, recordkeeper and/or delegate thereof. As determined by the Plan Administrator, this system may take any form (
<I>
	e.g.
</I>
	, it may include an interactive
	telephone participant response system, either menu-driven or with a live attendant, a paper document system, an internet site, an intranet site, or an e-mail protocol). The system may allow Participants to commence participation in the Plan (in
	accordance with Section&nbsp;2.1), to make and change their Contribution Elections (in accordance with Section&nbsp;3.1(c)), to make and change their Investment Elections (in accordance with Section&nbsp;4.2), to apply for an in-service withdrawal
	(in accordance with Article VI), to apply for a plan loan (in accordance with Article VII), and to request a
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX" ALIGN="CENTER">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	-11-
</FONT>
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage89"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	distribution (in accordance with Article VIII). Different features of the Participant Response System may be used for different purposes (e.g., Participants may be allowed to use the internet for
	some purposes but may be required to contact a live telephone attendant to initiate a loan), may be offered to different groups of Participants, and may be made available only in limited circumstances (e.g., a live telephone attendant may only be
	available during limited hours). The Participant Response System may require Participants to use security protocols, including a &#147;personal identification number&#148; (&#147;PIN&#148;). Unless the Participant uses the form or protocol that is
	specifically permitted by the Plan Administrator for the purpose in question, the Participant&#146;s communication shall not be deemed to be made through the Participant Response System.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">

<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	&#147;Period of Severance&#148;
</B>
	means the period of time commencing on an Associate&#146;s Service Cutoff Date and ending on the Associate&#146;s next
	Reemployment Commencement Date during which the Associate is not employed by the Company&#146;s Controlled Group.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>

</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">

	&#147;Plan&#148;
</B>
	means this Plan, the Williams-Sonoma, Inc. 401(k) Plan, as it may be amended and restated from time to time. This Plan may also be referred to
	as the &#147;401(k) Plan.&#148;
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	1.44
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	&#147;Plan Administrator&#148;
</B>
	means the Administrative Committee. The Administrative Committee shall consist of one or more persons appointed by the Board or
	the Human Resources Committee of the Board. As Plan Administrator, the Administrative Committee shall have authority to administer the Plan as provided in Article X. The Plan Administrator may interact with Participants and Beneficiaries through the
	party currently designated as recordkeeper for the Plan. Therefore, to the extent authorized by the Plan Administrator, any communication by a Participant or Beneficiary with such recordkeeper shall be deemed to be a communication with the Plan
	Administrator, and any communication by the recordkeeper with a Participant and Beneficiary shall be deemed to be a communication by the Plan Administrator.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>

	agency or instrumentality of a state or political subdivision of a state.

	&nbsp;

<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">

<FONT SIZE="1">

</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	Which is an &#147;eligible rollover distribution&#148; as defined in Code &#167; 402(c)(4); and
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	(c)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	Which is contributed to the Plan not later than 60 days after the Eligible Associate receives it (or such later date as is permitted by the Secretary of the Treasury on
	account of the recipient&#146;s hardship pursuant to Code &#167; 402(c)(3)(B)), in the event the Eligible Associate receives the distribution from the other plan, annuity, account or contract instead of electing its direct rollover to this Plan.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; MARGIN-LEFT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	Accordingly, an Eligible Associate&#146;s after-tax contributions to, and hardship distributions from, another
	plan or arrangement are not eligible for rollover into this Plan. The Plan Administrator shall determine whether a requested contribution constitutes a Rollover Contribution.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	1.54
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	&#147;Rollover Contributions Account&#148;
</B>
	means the separate subaccount of a Participant&#146;s Account or an Account established on behalf of an Eligible
	Associate to which Rollover Contributions and any income or loss thereon are credited.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	1.55
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	&#147;Separation from Service&#148;
</B>
<B>
	or &#147;Separates from Service&#148;
</B>
	means the termination of the Associate&#146;s employment
	relationship with the Company&#146;s Controlled Group, including by quit, resignation, discharge, retirement, disability, or layoff. For purposes of the
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>

<P>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	Plan&#146;s limitations on the right of a Participant to take an in-service distribution from the Plan pursuant to Code &#167; 401(k)(2)(B) (e.g., as the term is used in Section&nbsp;8.1
	(eligibility for distribution upon separation from service)), &#147;Separation from Service&#148; means separation from employment as that phrase is defined for purposes of Code &#167; 401(k)(2)(B).

	of Service in this Article I), and

</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	&#147;Year of Vesting Service&#148;
</B>
	means a 365 day &#147;period of service&#148; (as defined below), but excluding service before February&nbsp;1, 1988.
	Separate periods of service shall be aggregated in calculating Years of Vesting Service. A period of service means the period commencing on the Associate&#146;s Employment Commencement Date or Reemployment Commencement Date and ending on the next
	Service Cutoff Date, and shall include a Period of Severance (post-February&nbsp;1, 1988) that lasts no more than 12 consecutive months.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
